mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bicycle (stationId, rackTotCnt, stationName, parkingBikeTotCnt, shared, stationLatitude, stationLongitude, regDate, editDate) VALUES ( #{stationId}, #{rackTotCnt}, #{stationName}, #{parkingBikeTotCnt}, #{shared}, #{stationLatitude}, #{stationLongitude}, now(), now() );
mapper.update: UPDATE bicycle SET stationId = #{stationId}, rackTotCnt = #{rackTotCnt}, stationName = #{stationName}, parkingBikeTotCnt = #{parkingBikeTotCnt}, shared = #{shared}, stationLatitude = #{stationLatitude}, stationLongitude = #{stationLongitude}, editDate = now() WHERE stationId=#{stationId};
mapper.select:
Select stationId, rackTotCnt, stationName, parkingBikeTotCnt, shared, stationLatitude, stationLongitude FROM
stationName LIKE concat ('%', #{stationName},'%')
ORDER BY stationName DESC
